project.name: Apache Tika OSGi classic bundle
project.description: OSGi bundle that contains the tika-parsers-classic component and all its upstream dependencies that aren't OSGI bundles by themselves. This bundle exports no packages, only the Parser and Detector services from the tika-parsers component.
